news.content:
ðŸ“° Introducing: ThreeFold Weekly!


It was an active first week of 2022 with three deep dive meetups and developments on farming & grid, with TFT and more.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/threefold-weekly-january-7th-edition/1707


Weâ€™re launching weekly updates as an easy way to keep the community up to speed with all thatâ€™s happening in the ThreeFold universe each week, from the ThreeFold Foundation Team.
news.excerpt: Introducing your weekly digest from the ThreeFold Foundation team!
